abstract: Merrill Lynch lost another senior executive as the firm’s investment banking chief, Gregory J. Fleming, announced that he would leave for a teaching post at Yale.
snippet: Merrill Lynch lost another senior executive as the firm’s investment banking chief, Gregory J. Fleming, announced that he would leave for a teaching post at Yale.
lead_paragraph: Merrill Lynch lost another senior executive on Thursday as the firm’s investment banking chief, Gregory J. Fleming, announced that he would leave for a teaching post at Yale.

headline.main: Another Merrill Executive Departs in Wake of Merger
headline.print_headline: Another Merrill Executive Departs in Wake of Merger

abstract: China Construction Bank said on Thursday it was “fully confident” in its strategic relationship with Bank of America, after the top U.S. lender sold nearly 13 percent of its holding in the Chinese bank this week.
lead_paragraph: China Construction Bank said on Thursday it was “fully confident” in its strategic relationship with Bank of America, after the top U.S. lender sold nearly 13 percent of its holding in the Chinese bank this week.

headline.main: China Bank Says BofA Relationship Is Sound

abstract: Mark Matthews, the chief Asia strategist at Merrill Lynch, has reportedly left the firm, in what would be the latest executive departure from Merrill, following the investment bank’s takeover by Bank of America.
lead_paragraph: Mark Matthews, the chief Asia strategist at Merrill Lynch, has reportedly left the firm, in what would be the latest executive departure from Merrill, following the investment bank’s takeover by Bank of America.

headline.main: Merrill’s Chief Asia Strategist to Leave, Reports Say
